Package com.fssa.freshnest.services

Class ChatService

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.freshnest.services.ChatService
public class ChatService extends Object
This class provides services related to chat management, such as register, login, list, update, and delete.
Author:
SusikumarPitchaimuth

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatService

      public ChatService()

  • Method Details

    • createChat

      public boolean createChat (Chat insertChat, Chat insertChatParticipant, Chat insertMessage) throws ServiceException
      Send the chat message.
      Parameters:
      insertChat - The chat group to be created.
      insertChatParticipant - The chat participant details like id will be added.
      insertMessage - The sender message will be added to the database with the chat id.
      Returns:
      A success message if the message send successfully, or an error message if not.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there is a problem with service.

    • readChat

      public List<Chat> readChat (Chat chat) throws ServiceException
      List the group chats.
      Parameters:
      chat - List the chat message to the group according to the chat group id.
      Returns:
      A success message if they list the chat message successfully, or an error message.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there is a problem with the service.

    • updateChat

      public boolean updateChat (Chat chat) throws ServiceException
      Update the chat message
      Parameters:
      chat - The chat object containing the updated information
      Returns:
      The updated chat object
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there is an issue with the service.

    • deleteChat

      public boolean deleteChat (Chat chat) throws ServiceException
      Delete the chat message
      Parameters:
      chat - The chat object containing the deleting chat id and user id information.
      Returns:
      True if the chat message is deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - If there's a problem with the service.
